scoring.engine.checker.ssh_check module¶

scoring.engine.checker.ssh_check.output_check(poll_result, expected)[source]¶

Determines if a task was successful by checking that the last character in the output is ‘0’.

Typically a command should invoke ‘echo $?’ to get the return status of the last command.
